Package resources.textures

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChangableColorSpace
    Interface for textures where allowed to change the color space.
    CubeMapTexture
    Interface for the cubemap textures.
    EasyFiltering
    Easy filtering settings to textures.
    Texture
    Base interface for all types of textures.
    Texture2D
    Interface for the standard 2D textures.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTexture
    Basic data and methods for implementing a texture.
    DynamicTexture2D
    Dynamic texture for FBO attachments.
    StaticCubeMapTexture
    Stores data about a loaded texture.
    StaticTexture
    Base class for static (loaded from file) textures.
    StaticTexture2D
    Stores data about a loaded texture.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EasyFiltering.TextureFiltering
    Texture filtering modes.
    Texture.TextureFilter
    Texture filter mode.
    Texture.TextureFilterType
    Texture filter type.
    Texture.TextureWrap
    Texture wrap mode.
    Texture.TextureWrapDirection
    Texture wrap direction.
